reviewtext: I'm surprised more people have not posted about what a disaster this product is, with many many early failures.  There is a very long and heated thread on Seagate forums:[...]Mine:  Installed 24 Nov 2008, died 19 Jan 2009, with about 60 hours of video files I had copied from family camcorder tapes at 1x.Too bad to see a company that used to have a fine reputation going down the toilet.
